definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: Virus-infected emails struck fear into the Microsoft Company.
sentences.chinese: 攜帶病毒的電子郵件引起了微軟公司的恐慌。

sentences.english: Spokeswomen for Apple and Microsoft declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司和微軟公司的發言人拒絕置評。

sentences.english: Subsequently, browsers produced by Netscape and Microsoft have become predominant.
sentences.chinese: 最後，網景公司和微軟公司的瀏覽器居於主宰地位。

sentences.english: I am Stone Lee, executive manager of the sales department of Microsoft Company.
sentences.chinese: 我叫李石頭，微軟公司銷售部執行經理。

sentences.english: That benevolent attitude didn’t seem to mesh with Microsoft’s public statements.
sentences.chinese: 如此仁慈的態度似乎和微軟公司公衆聲明並不融合。

sentences.english: Microsoft Corp. and Travelers Cos. were also dragging down the Dow.
sentences.chinese: 微軟公司和旅行者集團跌幅居前。

sentences.english: It was a major victory for the embattled software maker.
sentences.chinese: 這對陷入壟斷案的微軟公司來說是一個重大勝利。

sentences.english: The headquarter of Microsoft is in Seattle.
sentences.chinese: 微軟公司總部設在西雅圖。

sentences.english: The answer lies in an understanding of Microsoft's history and culture.
sentences.chinese: 問題的答案就在對微軟公司歷史和文化的理解當中。

sentences.english: You will be able to get a tele-technical support from Microsoft.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以得到微軟公司的電話技術支持，等等。

sentences.english: The Microsoft Corporation was charged with violations of anti-monopoly laws.
sentences.chinese: 微軟公司被指控違反反壟斷法。

sentences.english: Ballmer is now Microsoft's chief executive officer.
sentences.chinese: 博馬現在是微軟公司的首席執行官。

sentences.english: What Apple is doing is working. What Microsoft is doing is not.
sentences.chinese: 目前蘋果公司做的是有效的，微軟公司的就未必了。

sentences.english: I have no control over the size and frequency of Microsoft’s software updates.
sentences.chinese: 我不能夠控制微軟公司軟件更新資料的大小和頻率。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Microsoft is porting DCOM to non-Microsoft platforms.
sentences.chinese: 同時，微軟公司正在把DCOM移植到非微軟平臺上。

sentences.english: There are many smart and talented people inside Microsoft who know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 微軟公司裏還有很多才華橫溢的聰明人知道該怎樣做。

definition: Jobs (name)/see also 史提夫·賈伯斯|史提夫·贾伯斯[Shi3 ti2 fu1 · Jia3 bo2 si1], Steve Jobs

pinyin: Nan2 yang2 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2
